Package ru.nsu.fit.tsukanov.calculator.core.parser

Class CalculatorParser<T>

java.lang.Object
ru.nsu.fit.tsukanov.calculator.core.parser.CalculatorParser<T>
Type Parameters:
T - the number
public class CalculatorParser<T> extends Object
Combines function and number parsers. Generate function from string (token).
See Also:
FunctionParser, NumberParserInterface, Function

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if token can be recognized as number

    • isFunction

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if token can be recognized as function

    • parse

      public Function<T> parse​(String token) throws BadTokenException
      Parse token as number or as function (checked for function firstly). If there is some problem then throws exception. Return function (function can be zero-arity that means number or the constant).
      Parameters:
      token - token that parser try to recognize
      Returns:
      the function of the parsed token
      Throws:
      BadTokenException - if there is problem with parsing.
